thread.title: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game
thread.title_full: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game

title: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game
text:
> Sports Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game The Chicago Cubs douse each other after defeating the Pittsburgh Pirates in the National League wild card baseball game, 4-0, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Pittsburgh. They advance to play the St. Louis Cardinals in the National League division series. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar)
